__author__ = 'trunghieu11'

def isPalindrome(x):
    return x == x[::-1]
    
def primTable(n):
    prime = [True] * n
    prime[0] = prime[1] = False
    for i in range(2, n):
        if prime[i]:
            j = i * i
            while j < n:
                prime[j] = False
                j += i
    return prime

def main():
    n = int(raw_input())
    isPrime = primTable(10000000)
    while not isPalindrome(str(n)) or not isPrime[n]:
        n += 1
    print n
    
if __name__ == '__main__':
    # testCase = int(raw_input())
    # for test in range(testCase):
        main()
